Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: inerisu liki denibariwochi yemeda ahiyochi yimesilalu፡፡
yilik’unimi ke’inerisu iyanidanidu sewi hulu yetezeregu ts’ihufochini inidisiset’i yifeligali፡፡
alahimi kalisha besitek’eri ayigesets’umi፡፡ irisu (alahi) yemeferati balebeti yemihiretimi balebeti newi፡፡
(negeru kehadiwochi inidemiluti) ayidelemi፡፡ betinisa’e k’eni imilalehu፡፡
ayidelemi t’atochuni (fiti inide neberu) bemasitekakeli layi chayochi sinihoni (inisebesibachewaleni)፡፡
yilik’unimi sewi befitu balewi negeri (betinisa’e) liyasitebabili yifeligali፡፡
«sewi beziya k’eni mesheshawi yeti newi?» yilali፡፡
beziya k’eni merigiyawi wede getahi bicha newi፡፡
sewi beziya k’eni basik’edemewina basik’oyewi hulu yinegerali፡፡
be’irigit’imi sewi benefisu layi asireji newi፡፡ (akalochu yimesekirubetali)፡፡
be’irisu (bek’uri’ani nibabi) litichekuli milasihini be’irisu atalawisi፡፡
(belibihi wisit’i) mesebisebuna manibebu be’inya layi newina፡፡
